<ns24:record xsi:type="ns17:Employee" internalId="{$internalId}" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> { if (fn:exists($releaseDate)) then () else if(fn:exists($supervisor_internalId)) then () else <nullFieldList xmlns="urn:core_2018_1.platform.webservices.netsuite.com"> <name>releaseDate</name> </nullFieldList> } { if (fn:exists($firstName)) then <ns17:firstName>{$firstName}</ns17:firstName> else () } { if (fn:exists($middleName)) then <ns17:middleName>{$middleName}</ns17:middleName> else () } { if (fn:exists($lastName)) then <ns17:lastName>{$lastName}</ns17:lastName> else () } { if (fn:exists($email)) then <ns17:email>{$email}</ns17:email> else () } { if (fn:exists($subsidiary_internalId)) then <ns17:subsidiary internalId="{$subsidiary_internalId}"/> else () } { if (fn:exists($supervisor_internalId)) then <ns17:supervisor internalId="{$supervisor_internalId}"/> else () } { if (fn:exists($department_internalId)) then <ns17:department internalId="{$department_internalId}"/> else () } { if (fn:exists($externalId_CiscoEmployeeNumber)) then <ns17:externalId>{$externalId_CiscoEmployeeNumber}</ns17:externalId> else () } { if (fn:exists($isInactive)) then <ns17:isInactive>{$isInactive}</ns17:isInactive> else () } { if (fn:exists($releaseDate)) then <ns17:releaseDate>{$releaseDate}</ns17:releaseDate> else () } { if (fn:exists($customForm)) then <ns17:customForm internalId="{$customForm}"/> else () } { if (fn:exists($isSalesRep)) then <ns17:isSalesRep>{$isSalesRep}</ns17:isSalesRep> else () }
<ns17:customFieldList> { if (fn:exists($ciscoEmail)) then <customField xsi:type="StringCustomFieldRef" scriptId="custentity_cisco_employee_email"> <value>{$ciscoEmail}</value> </customField> else () } { if (fn:exists($ciscoEmployeeNumber)) then <customField xsi:type="StringCustomFieldRef" scriptId="custentity_cisco_employee_id"> <value>{$ciscoEmployeeNumber}</value> </customField> else () } { if (fn:exists($ciscoEmployeeLevel)) then <customField xsi:type="StringCustomFieldRef" scriptId="custentity_cisco_employee_level"> <value>{$ciscoEmployeeLevel}</value> </customField> else () } { if </customField> else () } { if (fn:exists($ciscoCustomJobTitle)) then <customField xsi:type="StringCustomFieldRef" scriptId="custentitycustfield_cisco_job_title"> <value>{$ciscoCustomJobTitle}</value> </customField> else () } { if (fn:exists($ciscoCustomLocation)) then <customField xsi:type="StringCustomFieldRef" scriptId="custentitycustfield_cisco_location"> <value>{$ciscoCustomLocation}</value> </customField> else () } { if (fn:exists($ciscoCustomWorkerType)) then <customField xsi:type="StringCustomFieldRef" scriptId="custentitycustfiled_cisco_worker_type"> scriptId="custentitycustfield_cisco_aqa_hire_date"> <value>{$ciscoCustomAcqHireDate}</value> </customField> else () } { if (fn:exists($ciscoCustomCiscoJobTitle)) then <customField xsi:type="StringCustomFieldRef" scriptId="custentitycustfield_cisco_aqa_job_title"> <value>{$ciscoCustomCiscoJobTitle}</value> </customField> else () } { if xsi:type="StringCustomFieldRef" scriptId="custentitycustfield_cisco_hr_work_region"> <value>{$ciscoCustomHRWorkRegion}</value> </customField> else () } { if (fn:exists($ciscoCustomHRWorkState)) then <customField xsi:type="StringCustomFieldRef" scriptId="custentitycustfield_cisco_hr_wrk_state"> <value>{$ciscoCustomHRWorkState}</value> </customField> else () } { if (fn:exists($ciscoCustomStatusCode)) then <customField xsi:type="StringCustomFieldRef" scriptId="custentitycustfield_cisco_status_code"> <value>{$ciscoCustomStatusCode}</value> </customField> else () } { if (fn:exists($ciscoCustomTrsnferDateFromCiscoToAppD)) then <customField xsi:type="DateCustomFieldRef" scriptId="custentitycustfiled_cisc_tx_dt_appd"> <value>{$ciscoCustomTrsnferDateFromCiscoToAppD}</value> </customField> else () } { if (fn:exists($ciscoCustomWorkerCategory)) then <customField xsi:type="StringCustomFieldRef"
